name: Intruder (itch) (Ahmet Kamil Keleş)
description:
Intruder is a thriller/adventure about a woman stuck in her 2-story house with an intruder. She will hide from the intruder and find a way to escape from the house.

You can keep only two inventory items at a time. The intruder will keep walking inside the house in the completed game, you must not get caught by him!

In this beta, we want players to test if the game's controls are understandable. The puzzles are easy and short for now. We will keep working on development according to your feedbacks. We are waiting for them!
